title: N-Delta hopeful on VP’s visit, Evah tells US diplomat - Vanguard News
text:
Home » News » N-Delta hopeful on VP’s visit, Evah tells US diplomat N-Delta hopeful on VP’s visit, Evah tells US diplomat On 5:38 am In News by Okogba Comments 
By Tony Nwankwo 
The political head of the American Embassy in Nigeria, Mr. Martin Hardinger, has paid a courtesy visit to the Co-ordinator, Ijaw Monitoring Group, Comrade Joseph Evah, to ascertain the stand of the Niger Delta people over the recent tour of Acting President Yemi Osinbajo to the region. 
Responding to the American diplomat and his delegation, Evah said the Niger Delta people appreciated the visit of Osinbajo. 
He however said there was nothing new about the visit aside the usual promises the people have been saddled with since the beginning of this democratic dispensation in 1999.
